# idsec_sia_strong_accounts (Data Source)

SIA Strong Accounts data source, reads strong account information and metadata, based on the id of the account.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) ID of the account to get

### Optional

- `account_name` (String) Account name of the account
- `address` (String) Address of the account
- `auth_database` (String) Authentication database of the account
- `aws_access_key_id` (String) AWS Access Key ID of the account
- `aws_account_id` (String) AWS Access Key ID of the account
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp
- `created_by` (String) User who created the account
- `database` (String) Database of the account
- `dsn` (String) DSN of the account
- `modified_at` (String) Last modification timestamp
- `modified_by` (String) User who last modified the account
- `name` (String) Account name
- `platform` (String) Platform of the account, The required Propeties are dependent on the platform
- `port` (Number) Port of the account
- `safe` (String) Safe of the account
- `store_type` (String) Type of store: pam or managed
- `username` (String) Username of the account
